summary: Allows you to have up to 20 music tracks of your choice play in your house!
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.youtube.com/user/Demidekidasu][IMG]http://www.massey.ac.nz/massey/fms/Massey%20News/site-images/icons/social-media/youtube-icon.png[/IMG][/url][url=https://twitter.com/Demidekidasu][IMG]http://www.kellilampkin.com/wp-content/plugins/wp-greet-box/images/twitter_icon.png[/IMG][/url][/center]

[center][color=yellow]A minor conflict has been reported with [i]UFO,[/i] but I have been told it can be corrected by simply loading this mod [u]after[/u] [i]UFO.[/i][/color][/center]

[b][u]CUSTOM MUSIC IN YOUR HOUSE[/u][/b]
A lot of people seemed to quite like the custom music feature of my player house, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27807]Millview[/url] so I thought I would make this which allows you to have up to twenty music tracks of your choice play in Skyrim\'s vanilla player homes.


[b][u]INSTRUCTIONS[/u][/b]
1) Download and install the mod via your preferred method (NMM or manual, whatevs...)

2) Activate the mod via your preferred method (NMM, or \"Data Files\" from the Skyrim launcher)

3) Decide upon up to 20 tracks you want in your house(s).

4) Convert your tracks into wave format (.wav). There are a billion-and-one ways to do this, google it if you don\'t know how.

5) Name your tracks numerically from \"01\" to \"20\" (eg. \"01.wav\", \"02.wav\" and so on...)

6) Place them into the folder I provided. The folder\'s full filepath will be:
	[color=limegreen]Windows XP =[/color] [YOUR HDD]:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Music\\PlayerHouse
	[color=limegreen]Vista/Windows 7 =[/color] [YOUR HDD]:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Music\\PlayerHouse


[u][b]SOME OF MY OTHER MODS[/b][/u]

- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27807]Millview - A lovingly Crafted Player Home[/url]
- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23216]Bard\'s Lute[/url]
- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26478]Erys[/url]
- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26589]Passtime[/url] (alpha test)
- [URL=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=832425]LTC - Lively Towns and Cities[/url] (coming soon!)
author: Demidekidasu
